welcome: Welcome to VoCoMi. What do you want to play
welcome2: Welcome to the first Voice Controlled Mixer. What do you want to play?
chord: Which chord do you want to play?
note: Which note do you want to play?
voice: Do you want to play male or female voice?
drums: Which drums element do you want to play?
repeat: Please, can you repeat, I didn't understand the last sentence
clean: Track cleared. You can start a new song now!
exit: Bye! I hope to see you soon!
